name: Google Cloud Firestore
semantic_context: Interact with Google Firebase - Cloud Firestore API
natural_language_description: 这是 Google Cloud Firestore 节点。主要用于: Interact with Google Firebase - Cloud Firestore API

authentication.name: authentication
authentication.natural_language_description: 参数名: Authentication | 默认值: googleFirebaseCloudFirestoreOAuth2Api

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: document

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: getAll
available_options: Get Many (值: getAll) - Get many root collections

projectId.name: projectId
projectId.description: As displayed in firebase console URL. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
projectId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Project Name or ID | 作用: As displayed in firebase console URL. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression. | (必填项)

database.name: database
database.description: Usually the provided default value will work
database.natural_language_description: 参数名: Database | 作用: Usually the provided default value will work | 默认值: (default) | (必填项)

collection.name: collection
collection.natural_language_description: 参数名: Collection | 作用: Collection name | (必填项)

documentId.name: documentId
documentId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Document ID | (必填项)

columns.name: columns
columns.natural_language_description: 参数名: Columns /Attributes | 作用: Columns to insert | (必填项)

simple.name: simple
simple.description: Whether to return a simplified version of the response instead of the raw data
simple.natural_language_description: 参数名: Simplify | 作用: Whether to return a simplified version of the response instead of the raw data | 默认值: True

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit
returnAll.natural_language_description: 参数名: Return All | 作用: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit | 默认值: False | (必填项)

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.natural_language_description: 参数名: Limit | 作用: Max number of results to return | 默认值: 100

updateKey.name: updateKey
updateKey.description: Name of the field in an input item that contains the document ID
updateKey.natural_language_description: 参数名: Update Key | 作用: Name of the field in an input item that contains the document ID | (必填项)

query.name: query
query.natural_language_description: 参数名: Query JSON | 作用: JSON query to execute | (必填项)
